personal.preferred_title: Senior Data Engineer | Capacity Planning & AI-Driven Infrastructure Optimization
personal.address: Murphy, TX (Plano area) / 424 Oriole Dr., Murphy, TX 75094

summary: Senior Data Engineer with 20+ years of enterprise experience. Specialized in migrating legacy on-prem pipelines to serverless AWS architectures (Glue/Athena/Bedrock). Expert in PySpark, GenAI agents (Text-to-SQL), high-scale capacity forecasting (Prophet/scikit-learn), automated telemetry pipelines, and executive-level reporting.

flagship_projects.name: Serverless Lakehouse Platform (AWS)
flagship_projects.description: Designed full serverless data platform using S3 + Glue + Athena + Bedrock. Built Text-to-SQL GenAI agent using Claude 3 Sonnet. Resolved small file problem using Snappy + Parquet compression. Optimized ETL and data access for enterprise scale.

flagship_projects.name: HorizonScale — AI Capacity Forecasting Engine
flagship_projects.description: Replaced legacy manual Trenda processes with parallel generator-based pipeline reduced forecasting cycles by 90%. Interactive Streamlit dashboard with real-time capacity insights and 'High Trust' utilization scores. Modern agentic pipeline replacing legacy Trenda processes for banking-scale telemetry. Features parallel generator-based forecasting (90% cycle reduction), interactive Streamlit dashboards, 'High Trust' utilization scores. A sample ML project called Horizon. Repository includes code, documentation, API guides, future roadmap, operational runbook, performance benchmarks, testing strategy, evolution notes, lessons learned, and AI reasoning/RAG specs.

flagship_projects.name: FAST Project
flagship_projects.description: Data mining user performance metrics to optimize critical money-generating systems.
